name: Super Breakeroids
description:
I MADE THIS for the fourth Dundee Jam held in March 2009.

(You can read more about that here.)

The theme for this Jam was 'Mashup' and I ended up mashing up two of my old faves: Super Breakout with Asteroids.

How to Play

        • Press the left-hand mouse button to start.
        • Use the mouse to move your bat.
        • Press the left-hand mouse button to launch your ball.
        • Hit your ball with your bat to break the blocks as you would bricks or rocks in space.
        • Hit the saucer equivalent to release an extra ball.
        • You have three lives.
